attributes.action: make mandatory drug testing at nightclubs and those testing positive for any chemical substances to tested on current affairs, economics and social history. Those failing to score more that 50% are to have their frontal lobe removed with a spoon as a lesson to others.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Upon entering night clubs all patrons are to be tested on knowledge of current affairs, politics, economics and social history. Those not scoring 50% plus on the standardised tests will be removed from society using a frontal lobe removal procedure and then undergo a forced sterilization atop a kitchen sink by a one legged man with fake teeth. 

The purpose of this is to stop the current decline in standards acoss the United Kingdom.
